headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: comment_type
parameters.description: Comment type. Enum values: ALL , COMMENT , REPLY . Default value: ["ALL"]

parameters.name: search_field
parameters.description: Field to search by. Enum value: ADGROUP_ID : To filter by an ad group ID.

parameters.name: search_value
parameters.description: Value to search. When search_field is ADGROUP_ID , specify an ad group ID via this field. To obtain the list of ad groups within your ad account, use /adgroup/get/ . Example: 1234567891234567 .

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Field to sort by. Enum values: CREATE_TIME , LIKES , REPLIES . Default value: CREATE_TIME .

parameters.name: sort_type
parameters.description: Sorting order. Enum values: ASC , DESC . Default value: DESC .

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start date of the time range that you want to get comments, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD .

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End date of the time range that you want to get comments, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD .

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-100. Default value: 10 .

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The return message. For Details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The return code. For details, see Appendix-Return Code .

fields.name: comment_type
fields.description: Comment type. It can be COMMENT , which is an original comment, or REPLY , which is a reply to an original comment.

fields.name: original_comment_id
fields.description: ID of the original comment. A value will be returned only when comment_type is REPLY .

fields.name: comment_status
fields.description: Comment status. Enum values: HIDDEN , PUBLIC .

fields.name: hit_blockedword
fields.description: Whether the comment contains blocked words.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the comment is created.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: ID of the campaign that contains the ad that the comment is added to.

fields.name: campaign_name
fields.description: Name of the campaign that contains the ad that the comment is added to.

fields.name: adgroup_id
fields.description: ID of the ad group that contains the ad that the comment is added to.

fields.name: adgroup_name
fields.description: Name of the ad group that contains the ad that the comment is added to.

fields.name: ad_id
fields.description: ID of the ad that the comment is added to.

fields.name: ad_name
fields.description: Name of the ad that the comment is added to.

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type. CUSTOMIZED_USER (Customized User), TT_USER (TikTok Business Account User). For details about identities, see Identities .

fields.name: can_delete
fields.description: Whether the comment can be deleted.

fields.name: is_auth_ttba
fields.description: Whether the user is linked to a TikTok Business Account.

fields.name: is_auth_comment_manage_scope
fields.description: Whether the user has the comment management permission.

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok user who made the comment. Example: "6123456789123456789" .
